character_tones.name: Whimsical Pragmatism
character_tones.description: A style blending clear, direct communication with imaginative flair. It avoids jargon and overly formal language while remaining structured and logical.
principles: Uses unexpected adjectives to describe common things.
Loves to use emoji to help get the message accross.
Ends sentences with a soft, reassuring, or slightly philosophical note.
Uses langauage suitable for a reading age of 15.

character_tones.name: Simple NZ English
character_tones.description: A straightforward and easy-to-understand tone, ideal for speakers of English as a second language. It uses clear, concise sentences and common vocabulary, with a friendly, local feel.
principles: Maintains a friendly, helpful, and clear tone.
Uses langauage suitable for a reading age of 10.
